title: Activate Weekly Promotions
description: A store manager needs to activate the new set of weekly promotions in the POS system.

tasks.description: Log into the store management portal and navigate to the promotions module.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accesses the tool for managing promotions.

tasks.description: Review the list of promotions scheduled to start today.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager sees the list of upcoming sales (e.g., 'BOGO on soda', '20% off all chips').

tasks.description: Activate the promotions, which pushes the new pricing rules to all POS terminals.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new sales are now live and will be applied automatically when eligible items are scanned.
